source.title: Getting Started: Installation | Next.js
source.description: Covers Next.js project creation via CLI or manual installation, including TypeScript, ESLint, Turbopack setup, and absolute import configuration.

source.title: Getting Started: Image Optimization | Next.js
source.description: Details Next.js Image component features including automatic optimisation, lazy loading, local and remote image handling, and remotePatterns configuration for secure image sources.

source.title: Architecture: Supported Browsers | Next.js
source.description: Documents Next.js browser support (Chrome 64+, Edge 79+, Firefox 67+, Safari 12+), Browserslist configuration, built-in polyfills, and custom polyfill strategies.

source.title: Getting Started: Caching and Revalidating | Next.js
source.description: Explains Next.js caching strategies using fetch, unstable_cache for database queries, and revalidation techniques via revalidateTag and revalidatePath in Server Actions.

source.title: Getting Started: Project Structure | Next.js
source.description: Comprehensive guide to Next.js folder conventions, file naming patterns, routing files, dynamic routes, route groups, private folders, metadata files, and project organisation strategies.
